reviewText: Awesome dvd this thing is on a loop in my house nephew can't get enough of it
Bought this for Christmas for our 3 year old son and he loves it! He is Monster Jam obsessed
I bought this as a Christmas present for my 13 yr old son. We loved it. I just thought that 50mins was very short for the price.
My 2 1/2 year old grandson loves monster trucks. He watches his monster truck movies over and over.
Another Monster Jam my son loves
I bought this for my 3 1/2 yr. old grandson after taking him to see Monster Jam...it's hilarious watching him get so excited while we watch this...he definitely makes us laugh out loud
Had to get for hubby to add to his vast collection of Monster Jam DVDs.  He was thrilled to say the least.
